Text:
10x man :)
It shows 0/0 S/L, will enabling DHT fix the problem :P

@Ov4ar
How do you enable DHT? I'm quite ignorant in these things...

@Ov4Ar
Apart this, I see on the Forum that they are aware of this and are working on it. It was already happening a few times in the past, looks only that this time it takes a little bit longer to fix it.

Hi man, in uTorrent you can find the option in Preferences - BitTorrent.
Hope they will fix the problem soon :P

@Ov4ar
I'm using Azureus/Vuze and there I can see the S/L, so no problem. The problem is only on TPB, where they are always 0/0, but they 'll fix it sooner or later, or at least the new buyers will take care of it. Who knows if I 'll be still here after that...
